text: Pehr Evind Svinhufvud, usually known as P. E. Svinhufvud, (1861 - 1944) was Finland's third president. He married Ellen Timgren and they had six children. His nickname was Ukko-Pekka. That's why name Pekka became more popular. Category:Presidents of Finland Category:1861 births Category:1944 deaths
title: Pehr Evind Svinhufvud
